snippet: The Commodity Futures Trading Commission rejected a plan for so-called political event contracts, wary of mixing politics and trading. The agency ruled, in part, that such trading amounted to gambling - and that it could unduly influence election...
abstract: The Commodity Futures Trading Commission rejected a plan for so-called political event contracts, wary of mixing politics and trading. The agency ruled, in part, that such trading amounted to gambling - and that it could unduly influence election results.

headline.main: Panel Rejects Proposal to Allow Election-Related Trading
headline.print_headline: Panel Rejects Proposal to Allow Election-Related Trading
